topic.title: Brazilian Users
topic.body:
Hi guys, find Brazilian users for discute about projects into zeronet.
Please contact-me:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/?to=marionunes

1533795431_1As12wFHyZFAw5j8wxKYFaXZbkwLV.body:
> [trooper](#comment_6_1Nyvgpgzk7BEEHs1TeTRwAtEDhF2txevSe): I suppose no, anyone can run it on own computer

I even have a host at home, and access by ssh with proxy socks, works perfect!

1534719186_1JsNmMgnbw85F25Drfg5YQ3Zdai6p.body:
> [schioppetta](#comment_1_1QBdE4PYVeGZPoYsuAXF2humkBXdfNSb9D): alo alo vc

Opa e ae beleza!
Bom que tenha brazucas por aqui!

1534803231_1JupR9ExhM4aiVd1Jyy2iuS12eukD.body: Cool, very interesting your proposal. I did not know this Elixir language.

1545219056_15TaxrtxopVTWbYVgp9fpeSv4thDg.body:
Creating content, Keeping a node online 24/7!
Inviting and introducing new people!

1549231253_1MzPWz97Wnb8Ny5D6sNYhNaaTyzpS.body: Mame? If I'm not mistaken, I saw references to that CPU in Mame.
Yes, but you need to make an " Virtual Hardware ", the debug in Mame is excelent!

1553712837_1NhJGZ6PxfCbBJg7pEaCr5R9pc3WM.body:
Eu basicamente já faço a minha parte!
Mantenho um host 24 horas no Brasil indexando grandes sites!
Mais de 100GB

> [hypercode](#comment_13_1GHXQ3vMtadfHFjTwS3roqYe8LUsyDqN8f): Claro, redes p2p em geral. no caso deles eu acho mais seguro focar mais na ipfs até.

Os dois em conjunto é perfeito, ipfs para filesystem, armazenamento de arquivos e a dinâmica do sistema na zeronet.

1553707562_131Seivv6aH8vnohPmYPcPwPfZ1a5.body:
> [klu9](#comment_128_131Seivv6aH8vnohPmYPcPwPfZ1a5ubMMs): @mg0: Just to confirm. that script gets the content, right? Republishing on ZeroNet would be another step?E.g. [...]

The problem is, size of site!

1554591322_1NhJGZ6PxfCbBJg7pEaCr5R9pc3WM.body:
Sempre Linux, uso em tudo!
Aqui em casa Windows nem para jogos mais.
